_header: The Apocalypse in English here now maketh end
_description: Couplet concluding a Middle English prose version of the Apocalypse

CamMagPep2498.Transcription:
Þe apocalips on englissch here now makeþ endeVnto þe
                    blis of heuen god graunte vs grace to wende
CamMagPep2498.Note: As colophon to text introduced by 5195.
CamMagPep2498.Editions:
James,  Montague Rhodes. 
             Bibliotheca Pepysiana: A Descriptive Catalogue of the Library of Samuel
                Pepys. Pt. III: Medieval Manuscripts.
         London, 1923: 3.107.
Påhlsson,  Joel,
                        ed.  
             The Recluse: a Fourteenth Century Version of the Ancren Riwle.
         Lund: Ohlsson, 1911: iv.
